title: Junior Software Engineer
description: Developing secure webapps to display the prediction of machine learning models as well as designing UI/UX mockups.

title: Teaching Assistant
description: Holding weekly lab sessions and consultations for the 2nd and 4th year students of undergraduate computer science studies at the on the subjects: Data Structures and Algorithms, Artificial Intelligence and Computer Graphics.

title: Full-Stack Intern
description: Developed e-commerce web platform with C2C sales model and option of bidding. Using React with Typescript on frontend and Java Spring with PostgreSQL database on the backend.

title: Intern
description: Worked on developing databases using Oracle SQL Developer, integrating data from Excel files to databases through SQL procedures and creating applications in Oracle Application Express (APEX) environment.

title: Volunteer

title: Computer Science Intern
